pullRequest.title: Add FabricItemSettings and an API for custom item equipment slots
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #952.
This PR adds two new types to the item API: FabricItemSettings and EquipmentSlotProvider.

FabricItemSettings

Similar to the FabricBlockSettings class in the object builder API, FabricItemSettings extends Item.Settings with additional hooks. The only hook in this PR is equipmentSlot, which sets the item's EquipmentSlotProvider.


EquipmentSlotProvider

A hook for MobEntity.getPreferredEquipmentSlot which allows modded items to set their preferred equipment slots.
This is useful with non-armor items that can go in armor slots, such as a block that can be a helmet.

commit.message:
Add FabricItemSettings and an API for custom item equipment slots

Closes #952.
